hero.headline: Digital Forms Management Made Easy
hero.subheadline: Streamline your workflow. Create, share, and sign professional forms in minutes.

features.title: Built for Modern Workflows
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage documents efficiently

template_based.title: Smart Templates
template_based.description: Launch faster with pre-built professional templates or build your own from scratch with our drag-and-drop editor.

instant_sharing.title: Share via Link
instant_sharing.description: Generate a secure public link in one click. Recipients can fill and sign on any device, no login required.

signature_collection.title: Legally Binding
signature_collection.description: Collect secure digital signatures with detailed audit trails, including timestamps.

real_time_tracking.title: Real-Time Dashboard
real_time_tracking.description: Monitor form views and submissions as they happen. Export data or integrate with your favorite tools.

how_it_works.title: Get Started in 3 Simple Steps
how_it_works.subtitle: From creation to collection in minutes

step1.title: Select or Create
step1.description: Choose from our verified template library or create a custom form tailored to your specific needs.

step2.title: Share Instantly
step2.description: Send a direct link to your recipients via email, SMS, or any messaging app. No friction.

step3.title: Track & Manage
step3.description: Get notified when forms are signed. View, download, and manage all your documents in one secure place.

no_account.title: Frictionless Signing
no_account.description: Remove barriers. Recipients sign immediately on any device without the hassle of creating an account.

save_time.title: Accelerate Workflows
save_time.description: Automate the signature collection process. Reduce turnaround times from days to minutes with smart reminders.

organized.title: Centralized Hub
organized.description: Keep all your agreements organized. Powerful search and filtering make finding documents a breeze.

compliant.title: Secure & Compliant
compliant.description: Enterprise-grade security ensuring your data and signatures are safe, private, and legally valid.

final_cta.title: Ready to Simplify Your Forms?
final_cta.description: Join organizations already using Simple Forms to streamline their signature collection.
